comments: Avoid this professor like the plague!! Do NOT take his online class. ANY for that matter. He is really late in responding to emails, is NOT clear on assignments, and will not upload them until the day before it is due!!! NEVER AGAIN!! If you want to be lost, then take this class. If you want a professor who is on top of things, take someone else.

His lectures were boring besides the occasional jokes he would put in. Overall the midterms and finals were based off the lecture slides that he presented in class, to pass all you had to do were review them and you would be good on his test. Only two discussions each before the midterm and final, but overall id say he\'s a easy teacher

his class is kinda boring but he\'s pretty funny. the midterm and final are based on the notes he gives us and some reading. it was pretty hard for me at the beginning. i did horrible on my midterm but i did pretty good on finals.

literally reads off the slides and no more than that...so whether you want to go to lecture or not is 100% optional. 1 midterm and a final so pretty straightforward and there are only 2 discussions the only quarter, one before the midterm and final. pretty easy class
